description:
I make pointless stuff and I think you should too. It might seem like a waste of time but I want to convince you, with the aid of some examples, that pointless projects are the best projects. You learn more, you have fun and itâ€™s easier than ever to share them with the world.

Recorded at JAMstack Conf 2018 in San Francisco. Learn about upcoming dates and locations at https://www.jamstackconf.com
Presented by Netlify. Learn more at https://www.netlify.com
title: Steve Gardner - Make More Pointless Things
